BANK HOLIDAY: 21 February 2022 – USD payments paused
Due to the upcoming federal US holiday on Monday, February 21, Bitstamp’s USD incoming and outgoing payments will be paused.

Due to the upcoming federal US holiday: President’s Day, all Bitstamp’s USD incoming and outgoing payments will be paused on Monday, February 21, 2022.

USD payments will resume the next working day – Tuesday, February 22, 2022.

Transfers in all other currencies will be processed without interruptions.

For any help please get in touch with us at support@bitstamp.net.
